name: Product Launch Workflow
description: Comprehensive product launch planning and execution

nodes.name: Market Research
nodes.action_prompt: Research target market, competitors, and customer needs

nodes.name: Strategy Planning
nodes.action_prompt: Develop launch strategy based on market research

nodes.name: Content Creation
nodes.action_prompt: Create marketing materials, documentation, and launch content

nodes.name: Final Review
nodes.action_prompt: Review all launch components and validate readiness
